00027 
00041 
00042 IsoperimetricProblem::IsoperimetricProblem(MultilayerPerceptron* newMultilayerPerceptron)       
00043 : ObjectiveFunctional(newMultilayerPerceptron)
00044 {
00045    // Control sentence
00046 
00047    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00048    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00049 
00050    if(numberOfInputs != 1 || numberOfOutputs != 2)
00051    {
00052       std::cerr << std::endl
00053                 << "Flood Error: IsoperimetricProblem class." << std::endl
00054                 << "IsoperimetricProblem(MultilayerPerceptron*) constructor." << std::endl
00055                 << "Number of inputs and outputs in multilayer perceptron must be 1 and 2, respectively."
00056                 << std::endl
00057                 << std::endl;
00058 
00059       exit(1);
00060    }
00061 
00062    perimeterGoal = 1.0;
00063 
00064    perimeterErrorWeight = 1.0;
00065    areaWeight = 1.0e-3;
00066 
00067    tolerance = 1.0e-12;
00068    initialSize = 1000;
00069 
00070    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setTolerance(tolerance);
00071    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setInitialSize(initialSize);
00072    
00073 }
00074

00098    initialSize = 10000;

00166 // void setPerimeterGoal(double) method
00167 
00171 
00172 void IsoperimetricProblem::setPerimeterGoal(double newPerimeterGoal)
00173 {
00174    // Control sentence    
00175 
00176    if(newPerimeterGoal <= 0.0)
00177    {
00178       std::cerr << std::endl
00179                 << "Flood Error: IsoperimetricProblem class." << std::endl
00180                 << "void setPerimeterGoal(double) method." << std::endl
00181                 << "Perimeter goal must be greater than 0." << std::endl
00182                 << std::endl;
00183 
00184       exit(1);
00185    }
00186 
00187    // Set perimeter goal
00188 
00189    perimeterGoal = newPerimeterGoal;
00190 }

00293 // Vector<double> calculateParticularSolution(Vector<double>) method
00294 
00304 
00305 Vector<double> IsoperimetricProblem::calculateParticularSolution(Vector<double> input)
00306 {
00307    // Control sentence    
00308    
00309    int size = input.getSize();
00310 
00311    if(size != 1)
00312    {
00313       std::cerr << std::endl
00314                 << "Flood Error: IsoperimetricProblem class." << std::endl
00315                 << "Vector<double> calculateParticularSolution(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00316                 << "Size of input vector must be 1." << std::endl
00317                 << std::endl;
00318 
00319       exit(1);
00320    }
00321 
00322    // Calculate particular solution
00323 
00324    Vector<double> particularSolution(2);
00325    particularSolution[0] = 0.0;
00326    particularSolution[1] = 0.0;
00327 
00328    return(particularSolution);
00329 }

00332 // Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolution(Vector<double>) method
00333 
00343 
00344 Vector<double> IsoperimetricProblem::calculateHomogeneousSolution(Vector<double> input)
00345 {
00346    // Control sentence    
00347    
00348    int size = input.getSize();
00349 
00350    if(size != 1)
00351    {
00352       std::cerr << std::endl
00353                 << "Flood Error: IsoperimetricProblem class." << std::endl
00354                 << "Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolution(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00355                 << "Size of input vector must be 1." << std::endl
00356                 << std::endl;
00357 
00358       exit(1);
00359    }
00360 
00361    // Calculate homogeneous solution
00362 
00363    Vector<double> homogeneousSolution(2);
00364 
00365    double t = input[0];
00366 
00367    homogeneousSolution[0] = t*(t-1.0);
00368    homogeneousSolution[1] = t*(t-1.0);
00369 
00370    return(homogeneousSolution);
00371 }

00412 // Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolutionDerivative(double) method
00413 
00422 
00423 Vector<double> IsoperimetricProblem::calculateHomogeneousSolutionDerivative(Vector<double> input)
00424 {
00425    // Control sentence    
00426    
00427    int size = input.getSize();
00428 
00429    if(size != 1)
00430    {
00431       std::cerr << std::endl
00432                 << "Flood Error: IsoperimetricProblem class." << std::endl
00433                 << "Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolutionDerivative(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00434                 << "Size of input vector must be 1." << std::endl
00435                 << std::endl;
00436 
00437       exit(1);
00438    }
00439 
00440    // Calculate homogeneous solution derivative
00441 
00442    Vector<double> homogeneousSolutionDerivative(2);
00443 
00444    double t = input[0];
00445 
00446    homogeneousSolutionDerivative[0] = 2.0*t - 1.0;
00447    homogeneousSolutionDerivative[1] = 2.0*t - 1.0;
00448 
00449    return(homogeneousSolutionDerivative);
00450 }

00452 
00453 // double calculateAreaIntegrand(double) method
00454 
00461 
00462 double IsoperimetricProblem::calculateAreaIntegrand(double t, double dummy)
00463 {
00464    // Control sentence    
00465    
00466    if(t < 0.0 || t > 1.0)
00467    {
00468       std::cerr << std::endl
00469                 << "Flood Error: IsoperimetricProblem class." << std::endl
00470                 << "double calculateAreaIntegrand(double) method." << std::endl
00471                 << "Parameter t must lie in the range [0,1]." << std::endl
00472                 << std::endl;
00473 
00474       exit(1);
00475    }
00476 
00477    // Calculate area integrand
00478 
00479    double areaIntegrand = 0.0;
00480    
00481    // Set input 
00482 
00483    Vector<double> input(1, t);
00484 
00485    // Get output
00486 
00487    Vector<double> output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input, *this);
00488 
00489    double x = output[0];
00490    double y = output[1];
00491 
00492    // Get jacobian
00493    
00494    Matrix<double> jacobian = multilayerPerceptron->calculateJacobian(input, *this);
00495 
00496    double dxdt = jacobian[0][0];
00497    double dydt = jacobian[0][1];
00498 
00499    // Calculate area integrand
00500 
00501    areaIntegrand = x*dydt - y*dxdt;
00502    
00503    return(areaIntegrand);   
00504 }
00505 
00506 
00507 // double calculateArea(void) method       
00508 
00513 
00514 double IsoperimetricProblem::calculateArea(void)      
00515 {
00516    double area = 0.0;
00517 
00518    Vector<double> x;
00519    Vector<double> y;
00520 
00521    int numberOfPoints = 
00522    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(*this, x, y, 
00523    &IsoperimetricProblem::calculateAreaIntegrand,
00524    0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00525 
00526    area = fabs(0.5*y[numberOfPoints-1]);
00527 
00528    return(area);   
00529 }
00530 
00531 
00532 // double calculatePerimeterIntegrand(double, double) method
00533 
00540 
00541 double IsoperimetricProblem::calculatePerimeterIntegrand(double t, double dummy)
00542 {
00543    // Control sentence    
00544    
00545    if(t < 0.0 || t > 1.0)
00546    {
00547       std::cerr << std::endl
00548                 << "Flood Error: IsoperimetricProblem class." << std::endl
00549                 << "double calculatePerimeterIntegrand(double) method." << std::endl
00550                 << "Parameter t must lie in the range [0,1]." << std::endl
00551                 << std::endl;
00552 
00553       exit(1);
00554    }
00555 
00556    // Calculate perimeter integrand
00557 
00558    double perimeterIntegrand = 0.0;
00559 
00560    // Set input
00561 
00562    Vector<double> input(1, t);
00563 
00564    // Get jacobian
00565    
00566    Matrix<double> jacobian = multilayerPerceptron->calculateJacobian(input, *this);
00567 
00568    double dxdt = jacobian[0][0];
00569    double dydt = jacobian[0][1];
00570 
00571    // Calculate perimeter integrand
00572 
00573    perimeterIntegrand = sqrt(pow(dxdt,2) + pow(dydt,2));
00574 
00575    return(perimeterIntegrand);
00576 }
00577 
00578 
00579 // double calculatePerimeter(void) method       
00580 //
00585 
00586 double IsoperimetricProblem::calculatePerimeter(void)      
00587 {
00588    double perimeter = 0.0;
00589 
00590    Vector<double> x;
00591    Vector<double> y;
00592 
00593    int numberOfPoints = 
00594    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(*this, x, y, 
00595    &IsoperimetricProblem::calculatePerimeterIntegrand,
00596    0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00597 
00598    perimeter = y[numberOfPoints-1];
00599 
00600    return(perimeter);   
00601 }
00602 
00603 
00604 // double calculatePerimeterError(void) method       
00605 
00608 
00609 double IsoperimetricProblem::calculatePerimeterError(void)    
00610 {   
00611    double perimeter = calculatePerimeter();
00612 
00613    double perimeterError = perimeterGoal - perimeter;
00614 
00615    return(perimeterError);
00616 }

00618 
00619 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00620 
00623 
00624 double IsoperimetricProblem::calculateEvaluation()
00625 {
00626     // Control sentence 
00627 
00628    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00629    {
00630       std::cerr << std::endl
00631                 << "Flood Error: IsoperimetricProblem class." << std::endl
00632                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00633                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00634                 << std::endl;
00635 
00636         exit(1);
00637    }
00638 
00639    // Increment number of evaluations
00640 
00641    numberOfEvaluations++;
00642 
00643    double evaluation = 0.0;
00644 
00645    double perimeterError = calculatePerimeterError();
00646    double area = calculateArea();
00647 
00648    evaluation = -1.0*areaWeight*area + perimeterErrorWeight*pow(perimeterError,2);
00649 
00650    return(evaluation);
00651 }

00654 // void saveResults(char*) method
00655 
00667 
00668 void IsoperimetricProblem::saveResults(char* filename)
00669 {
00670    std::fstream file; 
00671 
00672    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00673 
00674    if(!file.is_open())
00675    {
00676       std::cout << std::endl
00677                 << "Cannot open isoperimetric problem results data file." 
00678                 << std::endl;
00679       
00680       exit(1);
00681    }
00682    else
00683    {
00684       if(display)
00685       {
00686          std::cout << std::endl
00687                    << "Saving isoperimetric problem results to data file..." 
00688                    << std::endl;
00689       }
00690    }
00691 
00692    // File header
00693 
00694    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Isoperimetric problem results data file." << std::endl
00695         << "% Column data:" << std::endl
00696         << "%  1 - Independent variable (t)" << std::endl
00697         << "%  2 - Dependent variable (x)" << std::endl
00698         << "%  3 - Dependent variable (y)" << std::endl
00699         << std::endl;
00700 
00701    // File data
00702 
00703    Vector<double> input(1);
00704    Vector<double> output(2);
00705 
00706    Vector<double> particularSolution(2);
00707    Vector<double> homogeneousSolution(2);
00708 
00709    double t = 0.0;
00710    double x = 0.0;
00711    double y = 0.0;
00712 
00713    int numberOfPoints = 1001;
00714 
00715    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints; i++)
00716    {
00717       // Obtain t
00718 
00719       t = (double)i/(double)(numberOfPoints-1.0);
00720 
00721       // Obtain x and y
00722 
00723       input[0] = t;
00724 
00725       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input, *this);
00726       
00727       x = output[0];
00728       y = output[1];
00729       
00730       // Write t, x and y to file
00731 
00732       file << t << " " << x << " " << y << std::endl;   
00733    }   
00734 
00735    file.close();
00736 }

00740 
00749 
00750 void IsoperimetricProblem::print()
00751 {
00752    double perimeterError = calculatePerimeterError();
00753    double area = calculateArea();
00754 
00755    std::cout << "Perimeter error: " << perimeterError << std::endl
00756              << "Area: " << area << std::endl;
00757 }
